title: [K-12] Technology-Enhanced Experiential Learning Design for Strengthening Mathematical Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary mathematical concepts (functions, geometry, statistics, etc.)
context.additional_context: A station-rotation learning environment combining VR simulations and physical manipulation activities, utilizing learners' personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to calculate surface area and volume of 3D shapes by directly manipulating geometric concepts in a VR environment
Learners can predict and explain graph changes based on variable transformations using a function graph simulation tool

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
